name: Midnight Game
description:
In the year 1880, ghosts discovered Larasa city, which was ruled by Renas Queen, which has many treasures, gold, and precious stones hidden in it, so the ghosts decided to invade the city and steal treasures at midnight

Eyas found an old woman with a message in her hand where ghosts plan to invade the city at midnight and Eyas must eliminate the ghosts before midnight as he races against time
